title: Beautiful Github Profiles with Pinned Gists!

media:group.media:title: Beautiful Github Profiles with Pinned Gists!
media:group.media:description:
Pinned gists are an awesome way to give your github profile a bit of p e r s o n a l i t y.
Also I changed the youtube-box cron job to only run twice a day (every 5 minutes is a bit excessive)
